mapper.insert: insert into tache_detail (tache_id, flow_id, tache_name, activity_name, tache_desc, tache_spec_cd, tache_type_cd, weight, redispatch ) values ( #{tacheId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tacheName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacheDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacheSpecCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacheTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'N' )
